body:
Hi Michael,

The error tells me that the download wasn't probably successful. Can you check the size of the file? It should be 13.9 MB (14,647,001 bytes).

I also captured a video that shows how you can install these packages which may help: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/how-to-get-...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/how-to-get-radiance-and-daysim-installed)
